thread.title: Tennis: Sania-Hingis juggernaut rolls on as the duo enter Wuhan Open semis
thread.title_full: Tennis: Sania-Hingis juggernaut rolls on as the duo enter Wuhan Open semis | Latest News & Updates at Daily News & Analysis

author: PTI
title: Tennis: Sania-Hingis juggernaut rolls on as the duo enter Wuhan Open semis
text:
Sania Mirza and Martina Hingis entered the semi-finals of the Wuhan Open Getty Images Ace Indian tennis star Sania Mirza continued her juggernaut with partner Martina Hingis as the Indo-Swiss pair entered the semi-finals of the Wuhan Open WTA tournament at Wuhan on Thursday.
The top-seeded duo eased past the fifth-seeded US combine of Raquel Kops-Jones and Abigail Spears 6-2, 6-2 in the quarterfinal battle.
Sania and Hingis had it relatively easy in the second round against Klaudia Jans-Ignacik and Anastasia Rodionova (6-3, 6-2) after getting a first round bye in the tournament.
The successful pair have been on a high after winning the Wimbledon doubles crown and then the US Open trophy this year to add to their cabinet.
